summary:
18 Black Katanas is an ESP-mod, based on Akaviri Katana and Ebony Blade, but is not a simple replacer. You will have 18 new weapons in all weapon smithing categories + dragon with recipes for forge and grindstone. New ingot, new leather and other materials for crafting. The weapons can be improved and enchanted.
German/English readme, ML-ESP
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b]18 Black® Katanas HD 2.0 multilingual (G/E/S/F/I/R/PL/CZ) [/b][/size]

[img]http://s1.directupload.net//images/user/120217/xjc6fwqo.gif[/img]


[b]Hello @ all,[/b]

18 Black® Katanas is an ESP-Mod based on Akaviri-Katana and Ebonyblade. It is not a simple replacer, but gives you 18 new Weapons in 9 categories that can be crafted, improved and enchanted. Normal Akaviri-Katana, and Ebonyblade, are not affected by this mod.

You have one 1H- & 2H-Katana in each weapon category (iron, steel, elven, dwarven, orc, glass, ebony, daedric) plus in the armor-only category dreagon. The abilities you must have and the smithing perks needed are showned by following two tables:

For 2.0 version all textures are remade from scratch using Bethesdas new highres texture DLC, now resolution of textures is 16x bigger - from 512x512 to 2048x2048. Textures are very detailed masked out, taking me more than 8h with Photoshop. Katanas and the the scabbard for 1H version have glow maps, so golden parts are glowing in dark areas. "18 Black Katanas" is now engraved on both katanas and scabbard in dragon alphabet.

[img]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/3774-1-1324502913.png[/img]


All weapons and recipes already functioning well. This mod have stil alpha state because:
[list]
[*]It is still work in progress,
[*]I have only german version to test. I need people to report if this mod also functioning in other languages,
[*]New crafting materilas will come up again with a future "Black® Crafting" mod.
[/list]


[size=3][b]Install/Uninstall:[/b][/size]

Simply with NMM, for manual installation see detailed ReadMe!

[color=red][size=6][b]Finitely released:[/b][/size][/color] (click on image to load this mod)
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/309299-1328298959.gif[/img]



[b][size=3]Change-Log:[/size][/b]

[b][size=3]2.0[/size][/b]
[list]
[*]All textures remade from scratch, using new highres DLC,
[*]glow maps added, now katanas are glowing golden in dark areas,
[*]new custom env maps and normal maps added,
[*]Black Dragon, Black Gold, Black Leather and Black Leather Stripes Heart, replaced with vanilla materials, but not gone forever. 3.0 version will be based on a new coming up Black® Crafting mod with dozens of new materials (ingots, colored leathers, cottons, wools ...),
[*]New Pictures and logos added /edited.
[/list]

[b][size=3]1.02[/size][/b]
[list]
[*]All 18 Katanas introduced,
[*]All 18 Katanas rebalanced,
[*]16 new forge recipes added,
[*]16 new grindstone recipes added,
[*]Black Gold ingot with new mesh, texture and recipe for the smelter added,
[*]Black Leather with new mesh, texture and recipe added,
[*]Black Leather Stripes with new mesh, texture and recipe added,
[*]Black Dragon Heart with new mesh, texture and tanning rack recipe (workaround) added,
[*]New ReadMes in german & english,
[*]Pictures and logos added /edited,
[*]New email contact 18BlackKatanas@xxxxxx added.
[/list](Email only in readme to prevent spam)


[b][size=3]1.01 [/size][/b]
[list]
[*]Reload-Bug fixed
[*]"Black Katana" renamed to "Black Katana 9"
[*]"Black 2H-Katana 9" (Daedric) added,
[*]new Meshes & Textures from Ebony Blade for "Black 2H-Katana" edited,
[*]Textures of "Black Katana 9" redesigned,
[*]Changes in balancing of crafting and improvement,
[*] ReadMe edited,
[*]New pictures, logo and icon added.
[/list][b][size=3]1.00 [/size][/b]
[list]
[*]Initilal Release of only 1H Daedric Katana
[/list]If you like this mode, please vote/endorse for me. If it is not working, please write a comment.

Special Thanks to [size=3][b][color=red]Niko1695[/color][/b][/size] for russian translation of ReadMe.


[img]http://s14.directupload.net//images/user/120217/cfnsgcag.gif[/img]
author: Black Widowmaker - Software Unlimited

files.name: 18 Black Katanas HD ML
files.changelogHtml:
Due to CK issues all objects have new FormIDs, ESP completely rewritten with TESVsnip
All textures remade from scratch, using new highres texture DLC,
•new custom env maps and normal maps added,
•Black Dragon, Black Gold, Black Leather and Black Leather Stripes Heart, replaced with vanilla materials, but not gone forever. 3.0 version will be based on a new coming up Black® Crafting mod with dozens of new materials.
